text: Hagi ana vahe'enema Deviti'ma kegaga nehigeno nempu'amo Eliabu'ma nentahino'a, tusi arimpa Devitina ahenenteno anage hu'ne, Na'ante amafina e'nane? Iza sipisipi nagara kegava higenka trampina zamatrenka e'nane? Nagra antahi'noe, kefo antahi'zankamo higenka kagra kavufgara ra hunka ha'mofo uruha hunaku amafina e'nane.
